p: Results: A final sample of 206 patients was obtained at the end of the study. The incidence of AKI in the studied population was 27.2 % (n = 56), and the average scores of Renal Angina Index were 20.52 in those who develop AKI and 4.35 in those who didn’t develop AKI. This score offers a 90.7 % sensibility, 95.4 % specificity with an area under de curve of 0.963 (0.934-0.991). A positive predictive value of 0.88 was obtained and a negative predictive value 0.97.
